name: Pirate Treasure by CleverMedia
description: Avast, me hearties! Time to claim your treasure! All ye need do is to match three coins in a row to add them to your loot! This be a buccaneer's version of the classic match three game. Fair winds will bring you special bonuses when you make multiple matches. This here game includes four scurvy-preventing variations: Pirate Quest, Life at Sea, Swashbuckler and Canon Ball. So heave ho and hoist the mainsail!
